divs: sighting detailstonight while walking the dog, i happen to look up and seen a fireball with a tale behind it. it was orange\red, and it appeared very low in the sky it was so low that it disappeared behind the tree line. it didn't appear to be a shooting star. at the same time my husband was looking in another direction and was saying did you see that, a flash of light in the sky .
trends: There has been one other sighting in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around November 22nd 2009
